name: Wing 4
description:
> *The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have beenâ€”and none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

This is the fourth raid wing and probably the most beginner-friendly one in the game right now! We will have four encounters:
<:cairn:703930782003101758> **Cairn** - An easy but chaotic boss that favours condi DPS.
<:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** - An easy boss that lets you show off your DPS rotation.
<:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog** - An easy CC-heavy boss that favours power DPS.
<:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos** - A difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank** on <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** (Claim) and <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**. Tanking for the latter boss is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- One DPS player will need to take the **Handkiter** role. They will play DPS for the first three bosses and swap to a specialised build to do the `Hand Kiting` mechanic on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**. This is a role that requires a lot of survivability and I recommend bringing some toughness trinkets.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 4 run has a **Tank** assigned to a healer for <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** (Claim) and <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**. One of the <:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS** has to take the **Handkiter** role for <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.
